Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Laramie/Hirsch
ShortDescription: Southbound 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, North Avenue, Central, Division and Laramie: due to street blockage near Laramie/Hirsch.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, North Avenue, Central, Division, Laramie and over regular route: due to street blockage near Laramie/Hirsch.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
